import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import React from 'react'; function AddBookModal(probs){ return (
Add Book
Book Name Category {React.Children.toArray(probs.categriesData.map((item )=> { return }))} Author {React.Children.toArray(probs.authorData.map((item )=> { return }))} Image
{/* */}
); } export default AddBookModal;
